an9.21:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, thanehi uttarakuruka manussa deve ca tavatimse adhigganhanti jambudipake ca manusse.
an9.21:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi thanehi uttarakuruka manussa deve ca tavatimse adhigganhanti jambudipake ca manusse.
an9.21:2.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, thanehi deva tavatimsa uttarakuruke ca manusse adhigganhanti jambudipake ca manusse.
an9.21:2.3: Dibbena ayuna, dibbena vannena, dibbena sukhena—
an9.21:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi thanehi deva tavatimsa uttarakuruke ca manusse adhigganhanti jambudipake ca manusse.
an9.21:3.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, thanehi jambudipaka manussa uttarakuruke ca manusse adhigganhanti deve ca tavatimse.
an9.21:3.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi thanehi jambudipaka manussa uttarakuruke ca manusse adhigganhanti deve ca tavatimse”ti.
